segments.text: Observing this, the woman's focus on the plate is intense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink faucet is on, water filling and spilling out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming under her, but she doesn't react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly on the counter beside her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet's open, cookie jar inside full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the two-step stool, reaching up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool legs splayed, but he's holding steady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got a plate in one hand, cookies in the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl standing close, arm raised expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window above sink shows the garden path and bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains pulled back on the divided panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole setup looks like a normal afternoon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nothing out of the ordinary here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the stool might tipâ€”oh no!
segments.speaker: PAR
